item.title: Webclient problem
item.dc:creator: @Vicd Vicd
item.description:
@Vicd wrote:

Oops, my bad. :o
I didnt have the sprites.rscd located in the folder where it loads all the files.

Thanks

Oh, it doesn’t load up in the browser…

[code]<applet name=“Application” id=“game” width=“512” height=“345”

          archive="webclient/pkf2p.jar"
          code="org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient">
[/code]

It gets stuck right away, I can see the first screen when you open the client. (the loading bar, no text)

item.title: Webclient problem
item.dc:creator: @Vicd Vicd
item.description:
@Vicd wrote:

So, I downloaded PKScape’s source and currently I’m trying to get the webclient to work.
It loads the files from the host, but still gives me an error that I can’t solve myself.
Picture:

EntityHandler lines 174 ->

[code] for (int id = 0; id < items.length; ++id) {
if (items[id].getSprite() + 1 > invPictureCount)
invPictureCount = items[id].getSprite() + 1;

}[/code]

Mudclient lines 838 - 841

private final void loadConfigFilter() { drawLoadingBarText(15, "Downloading files, please wait."); EntityHandler.load(); }

Mudclient line 3117

GameWindow line 216

Read full topic
